member.name: M:ChatConsoleApp.Chat.start(System.String[])
member.summary: Start and connect server to client
member.param: Takes in string args to determine if server or client

member.name: M:ChatConsoleApp.Chat.listeningLoop(ChatLib.Messenger)
member.summary: Do listening loop waiting for response or keystrokes
member.param: Takes in server of client to listen for
